Fulfillment of Non-Negotiable Criteria.description:
- The candidate has no hands-on Java development experience, nor exposure to Spring Boot, REST APIs, or relational databases like MySQL/PostgreSQL.  
   - While they demonstrate problem-solving skills in automation contexts, none of the core Java fundamentals or build tools (Maven/Gradle) are present.

Fulfillment of Negotiable Criteria.description:
- There is no evidence of experience with microservices, cloud platforms, messaging systems (Kafka, RabbitMQ), or containerization (Docker).  
   - The candidate’s background is focused on PLC, robotics, and Python/C# image processing, which does not align with the optional Java ecosystem requirements.

Continuity and Recency of Relevant Exper.description:
- Recent experience is limited to automation engineering internships and academic projects unrelated to Java development or enterprise software practices.  
   - There is no continuity of software development work in Java or agile environments, making the candidate’s experience not directly transferable to the role.
